title: PEACE AND BALANCE - AMETHYST FENG SHUI CRYSTAL TREE WITH PYRAMID BASE

cleaned_text: Real peace and perfect harmony are already inside yourself, you just need to find them: Amethyst can be your perfect companion in this journey of self-care and can help you release any kind of stress and tension. Don't let everyday problems get to you: visualize Amethyst, feel it's incredibly soothing energy, and face them in a calm yet determined way to get the best results. Take a breath, create a bubble of peace around yourself, you deserve it. - Tree of life symbol: grounding, growth, rebirth, new start - Amethyst leaves: emotional balance, stress relief, tranquility - Size: Height 13-15 cm, Base 4 cm - Hand-wrapped copper wire - Handcrafted with 100% natural stones, size, shape, and color can slightly vary.
